summary: The diff modifies Header.tsx and LoginButton.tsx to revert logout button styling. LoginButton.tsx explicitly reverts to lighter gray styling (bg-gray-200 hover:bg-gray-300 text-gray-800) as required. Header.tsx is modified but truncated, so the desktop and mobile logout button styling changes cannot be fully verified. The file summaries confirm the intent aligns with REQ-1. No hallucinated features are evident.

missing_requirements.requirement: The logout button in the desktop header navigation and mobile navigation displays the same color/style as it did before the Version 35 dark color change.
missing_requirements.reason: Header.tsx is truncated in the diff, so the logout button styling for both desktop and mobile nav cannot be fully verified as reverted. The visible portion does not show the logout button rendering section.
